text: The Pride of St. Louis is a 1952 American biographical drama movie. It was directed by Harmon Jones. It stars Dan Dailey, Joanne Dru, and Richard Crenna. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. The Pride of St. Louis was nominated for an Academy Award in 1953. ==Other websites== * Category:1952 drama movies Category:1950s biographical movies Category:American biographical movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies directed by Harmon Jones
title: The Pride of St. Louis
